product.longDescription: Compact and uniform. Leaves are thick and have an excellent, crisp texture. Heads are very dense, hold well in the field, and can be marketed with Breen and Truchas for an attractive display. Bolting and tipburn tolerant. For spring, summer, and fall. Suitable for hydroponic systems. Utility Patent granted. High resistance to downy mildew races EU 16–27, 29, 32, 34; US 5–8, Nasonovia ribisnigri aphid, and tomato bushy stunt virus (lettuce dieback complex); and intermediate resistance to lettuce mosaic virus. MT0-30. Also available with NOP-compliant pelleting. USDA Certified Organic. Avg. 20,500 seeds/oz. Packet: 500 seeds.
